ingredients.ingredient: 2 medium sweet potatoes, scrubbed and sliced 1/8 inch thick using a mandoline, box grater, or knife
1 teaspoon BBQ spice rub or Parmesan cheese

cookingTips: Slice potatoes uniformly thin (⅛ inch) for even, consistent crispiness
Toss slices lightly with oil to avoid sogginess—less is more
Check chips at 15-minute intervals and remove browned ones early to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help user achieve uniform thickness, explain the balance between oil and crispiness, and manage variable cooking times for different chip sizes.
